mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SCHEDULE values(seq_sno.nextval, #{pno}, #{sname}, #{status}, #{progress}, to_date(#{startDate_s}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), to_date(#{endDate_s}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), #{budget})
mapper.update: UPDATE SCHEDULE SET sname = #{sname}, status = #{status}, progress = #{progress}, startDate = to_date(#{startDate_s}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), endDate = to_date(#{endDate_s}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), budget = #{budget} WHERE sno = #{sno}
mapper.select: SELECT a.userno, pno, name, email, dept, position FROM PRJPARTICIPANT p, ACCOUNT a WHERE p.USERNO = a.USERNO AND pno=#{pno}
SELECT NVL(AVG(s.PROGRESS),0) FROM PROJECT p, SCHEDULE s WHERE p.PNO = s.PNO(+) AND p.PNO = #{pno} GROUP BY p.PNO
SELECT s.SNO, a.USERNO, a.NAME, a.POSITION, a.DEPT FROM SCHPARTICIPANT s, ACCOUNT a WHERE s.USERNO = a.USERNO AND sno = #{sno}
